name: Dhergoloth
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The dhergoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: darkness, fear
* 3/day: sleep

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The dhergoloth's weapon attacks are magical.
